text: Ne bud' skupym, raskhoduya na dobroye, budto tvoya ruka prikovana k tvoyey sheye zheleznoy tsep'yu, tak chto ty ne mozhesh' yeyo protyanut'. No i ne bud' chrezmerno shchedrym, protyagivaya ruku i tratya den'gi beskontrol'no. Togda ty stanesh' libo poritsayemym za skupost', libo ostanesh'sya bez deneg, raskaivayas' i pechalyas'
